title: What was the number one song in September of 1964, and who was the artist? - Quora

response.answer_text: There were 3 number 1’s in September 64. At the start of the month, it was “Have I the right?” by the Honeycombs. On the 10th, this was replaced by “You really got me” by the Kink. Then on the 24th, “I’m into something good” by Herman’s Hermits got to number 1.
